messages.msgSnippet: I ve just noticed that scrolling right to the bottom reveals pages on numerous other arts and crafts. Barry Thomas. ... From: Barry Thomas
messages.messageBody:
I've just noticed that scrolling right to the bottom reveals pages on
numerous other arts and crafts.

Barry Thomas.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Barry Thomas" <warlord@...>
To: <samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 13, 2007 9:04 AM
Subject: INTERESTING WEBSITE - JAPANESE CERAMICS


Dear All,

Just stumbled on this which may be of more than passing interest to many:
http://www.nihon-kogeikai.com/TEBIKI-E/1.html

Best regards,
Barry Thomas.
